# Planar Tolerance (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]], [[Elysium (Domain)|Elysium]] 2, [[4th Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 4]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 7]], [[9th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V

**Range:** 20 ft.

**Targets:** One creature/level in a 20-ft.-radius burst centered on you

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 159

*You have barely time to bark out a few elder words of power, but then the pressure subsides, and you know you are safe long enough to complete your mission.*

This spell functions like *[[Avoid Planar Effects (Spell)|avoid planar effects]]*, except as noted above.
